name: Customizable Pixel Character
description:
Asset Store

Features

  • Customizable both in editor and runtime.
  • Animation Included with Animator properly set up.
  • Fully commented customization and controller scripts.
  • Easy drag and drop usage.
  • PSD files included.
  • 40 character presets.
  • Possible to make new animation inside Unity.
  • Supports Standard RP, URP and HDRP.

Notes

  • The animation is made using Skinned Mesh rather than frame by frame animation.
  • TextMesh Pro is used in demo scene. After installing this package, you may need to reopen the scene for texts to be displayed properly.

Customizable Parts

  • Gender
  • Skin Tone
  • Hairstyle x8
  • Hair Colorx8
  • Hat x23
  • Facewearx4
  • Clothx43
  • Pantsx35
  • Socksx8
  • Shoesx22
  • Backx9
  • Weapon x30

Animation Included

  • Idle
  • Walk
  • Run
  • Crouch
  • Crouch Move
  • Jump
  • Land
  • Attack (Swipe, Stab, Point, Summon)
  • Injured
  • Die
  • Blink
  • Expressions ( Normal, Happy, Injured, Dead, Shocked, Sad, Shy, Sick, Cat Face)
